reviews.text: From outside it's architecture & Stony look is very different & attractive. Location right on a busy traffic roundabout is big advantage but it remains generally closed. I made a special request to one of the staff who reluctantly opened it. Inside it is decent size, simple place of prayer. It was under maintenance & prayers are held on Sundays only & therefore I did not feel its aura. Yes, despite traffic all around campus was peaceful. Good for visiting.

It's a nice historical place made by British, made up of stone blocks, has a wonderful garden but not maintained well. It's a place where you can do photoshoots. During Christmas it is totally lighten by the colourful electric lights and also a fare is organised. It looks very beautiful on Christmas Eve during nights, gardens are also lighten by candles by the public used to visit on Christmas night
Nice place I can't explained how much but this place is looking very gorgeous that's all

One of the British era engineering marvel. Beautiful building which marks the start of civil road of Allahabad city. One is awesome stuck when he sees this church. One must take time to visit this old yet equal famous church. Recommended

Very beautiful cathedral. Made in 1871 and took 40 years to complete. It's in Gothic design. In the church you will find awesome architectural arches and whole interior and you can pray to God as it's very calm and peaceful.

The Super Laziest and worst Department of India are courts.There are lots and lots of cases pending and  No body has right to speak about them and this is the reason all citizens has to go one pillar to next pillar to get judgements. India hard earned tax from taxpayers can be used somewhere else to make India a Developed country. Don't keep hopes of getting some thing right even You are on right path..Here No body cares of truth..
The largest High Court of Asia !  That pretty sums up the magnanimity of this great historical Institution.
Very Cool place near by a church you can stay their 😊😊
Case is not in list...this is harassment of petitioner by computer section of court .case is pending to long for judgment...

Didn't get to see it from within. Although I wanted to. But since it was passed the scheduled close of time for the day, and maybe they also don't allow random Travellers like me inside the court room. I still exactly don't know the correct reason. But I was denied entry inside. Having said that, I didn't miss the opportunity to click some photos of the Allahabad High Court from outside. It's quite massive and imposing and also impressive...
Its a good place a bit old but its beauty will drag you there for morning walks or evening walks a good place to have a picnic !
Best park in Allahabad go and enjoy don't forget to visit Victoria memorial and library

Chandrasekhar Azad Park (British colonial era Alfred Park and informally Company Bagh) is a public park in Allahabad. Built in 1870 to mark Prince Alfred's visit to the city, with an area of 133 acres, it is the biggest park in Allahabad.It was renamed after freedom fighter Chandra Shekhar Azad, who sacrificed his life here, during the India independence struggle in 1931.Being a big park it has some of very important heritage and recreational sites.
Bhut bada garden hai ...aur bhut hi sundar
For a beautiful morning a place to start a new day every day

Khurso Bagh is a park where one could walk around and relax. It's home to a large number of trees which makes it a place to get some fresh air. Also there's some historic monuments. Though it's been shown that it closes at 9pm but the gate to monuments closes by 7pm. Should had been kept more beautiful and clean.

Nice place.. very cool and peaceful. so many things are under construction. So lovely place just few steps away from junction railway station. Their is no any type of charge for visiting. people and couple spends lots of time their.
Their is no sneaks and tea stole in the campus. But you can bring your own.
This is a historical place.

Very good place to enjoy the tranquility of nature. Parking facility is not available. U can reach here by using any local vehicle.It is near Allahabad junction. U can enjoy very peace atmosphere and beautiful work of architecture here. It also has a research area for doing research on plant species.

Nice place for morning walk , self study and get some new plants for your home
Can go with family as well.
Good for photoshoots as well with a lot of greenery and monument structures.
Have yoga classes as well

I have been here about 17 years back. Its good place. We used to be here quite frequent. 
Now I visited this place while I was at Allahabad for couple of hours. Its neat and clean area. You can easily identify this location.

I love this place because
Very quit environment
Ncert books are available
Competition books are also available
Poetry books and many others books are available
Free of cost
No books are allowed in library

My first love is Library, where I can focus myself 100% on the present moment and live my studies.
This Library is a typical beautiful library what a real student needs. One of the best place to sit and study in Allahabad that too free of cost and without any kind of membership.
Best peaceful place to study. Complete peace of mind, best thing is that they keep Old newspaper's past issue in one place so that students like us are able to prepare for exams .
You will be mesmerized to see this beautiful building surrounded be Alfred Park / company garden. Inside you will get real readers, newspapers to rare books I liked this place while I was student.
Best place for study. All competition books and other books are available here. Go for Study only.

One of the finest examples of wonderful works of civil engineering. This particular suspension bridge is a beauty and a great asset for the Allahabad city. also known as the lovers point as well as the famous suicide point this particular bridge attracts photographers as well as adventurers to create something beautiful.

The structure in itself is attraction for tourists having different colours of light at night. Good traffic flow and not much congestion. Beautiful views of city Paryagraaj and Sangam. Fresh flowing air also makes you feel better.

An awesome and a convenient place to visit . For sure you will get all the services and swiftly .
Supporting nature of employees and faculty members.  
Soothing surroundings and calm environment. 
Quality of service satisfactory as compared to the price asked of it.  Really had an awesome experience enjoying my day at the place.

I still remember when this bridge was constructed and opened for public, huge crowd started to come and see it.  It became a picnic spot though it's a very dangerous and risky place for such activities because of heavy traffic. Eventually few people died in accidents. 
Bridge is nice and good looking and fulfills the need of city, the old Naini pull was overloaded with traffic and construction of this bridge was a good thing.

One of the best work of ours engineer.evening time sean is good and environmen is cool and beautiful in looking. Reflection of setting sun on the Yamuna water can be seen from bridge which make it to bring more people on evening time .

This should definitely be on your checklist when visiting the city for the historic value it holds. One can see how minimalistic living was in order way back then and sense the clean and clear air around. Kinda similar to the Gandhi Ashram in Gujarat. Good to take children and educate them about the Nehru Family. The photography section on Indira Gandhi was also good, but children might find it boring. Place is well maintained. It would have been a better experience if there was a guide to explain everything around. Good for a one time visit, but definitely a must go-to place.

Awesome place to experience the Indian History and  heritage building. It's a great example of how rich Nehru was and how he used to live. There's 20₹ tickets for the ground floor where the study room, dining room, bedroom and drawing room. You need to pay 50₹ more to get to see 1st floor which includes only meeting room and one more room which was used as badminton court.

If you are interested in history specially Indian history you can't deny the role of Indira Gandhi as well as other Nehru's after independence and during the struggle. This place in particular has so many things to say and I was amazed how beautifully it was managed and well collaborated with other things that happen during that time. You can definitely pay a visit here and it's worth watching the way you want to.

This is the place where our first prime minister lives. His home is converted into museum. Lots of things to watch related to his memory. If you visit for purpose of remembering history its right place. Timings for visit must check before visit. Tickets should be taken to enter this. Little bit feeling of politics come in mind after watching it.

This is a well walked museum to the Nehru family and Gandhi also stayed there. It was all very interesting and well presented, although we did wonder why all the books on the many bookcases were placed in height order!!! It could not have been particularly good for the bookshelves (all the weight at one side) and would have been impossible to find any book! We spent an interesting hour or so on.
I am studying here nd learning........

Ganganatha Jha Campus of the Rashtriya Sanskrit Sansthan formerly known as Ganganath Jha Research Institute (from 1943-1971) and Ganganatha Jha Kendriya Sanskrit Vidyapeeth (from 1971-2002 underthe Ministry of HRD, Government of India) was founded on November 17, 1943 with a view to perpetuate the name and works of M. M. Dr. Sir Ganganatha Jha (b.1871 & d.1941), a renowned International figure of Orientology and Indology.
Campus of sanskrit vishwavidyalaya
Very beautiful campus
nice environment of campus

संस्कृत सीखने का सबसे बड़ा केंद्र है यह  इलाहाबाद में चंद्रशेखर पार्क में स्थित है यहां राष्ट्रीय स्तर की सम्मेलन भी होते हैं जिसके माध्यम से संस्कृत का प्रचार-प्रसार होता है संस्कृत भाषा को बचाने में इन जैसी संस्थाओं का बहुत ही योगदान रहा है
आज हमारे पास संस्कृत बोलने और समझने वाले लोगों का एक निश्चित डाटा उपलब्ध नहीं है कि कितने लोग संस्कृत बोल और समझ सकते हैं हमारी इस भाषा को बचाए रखने में ऐसी संस्थाओं का बहुत ही अधिक योगदान है

Bhardwaj Ashram Park is a nice place to visit with children. The renovation work has given a new look to the Ashram Park. The 15 feet tall statue of Saint Bhardwaj is adding to the beauty of this place. Entrance has a beautiful fountain work. Perfect destination for children and peace loving persons. Security is adequate and view of city is also good.
Situated on Balson Square, near Anand Bhawan.
This place got rejuvenation of the park with some ancient temple behind it during Kumbh Prayagraj 2019. The president of India has gifted it to Prayagraj during Kumbh 2019.

very beautiful statue of bhardwaj muni in bhardwaj park. this is 15 feet statue in this park front gate .this is very best and tall in all over prayagraj  . this park is now fame of prayagraj and i love this park now this time park view is very good and best

Bhardwaj Ashram Prayagraj
----------------------------------------------
 Famous place among all Hindu people and one of most auspicious Ashram in Prayagraj ,where Prabhu Ramaji  visited stayed with his brother Laximan, and wife princess Sitaji at the time of his Vanvasa, where his barther Bharata stayed when he was gone with his all family and Ayodhya people to meet Ramaji at Chitrakuta. This ashram is famous among all saints, Holly people and religious people .
Tucked away from main area.least crowded.spiritual place with a great tradition of sage Baradwaj

Oldest temple in allahabad.
Visit here.
Sweet quality very good and delicious
Very Neat and clean place for spiritual thinking and worship.
No vehicle allowance s
Very nice temple
God

It is a Holy temple of shankaracharya  . It is a amazing piece of architecture , you must have to visit this temple first it's well decorated temple and it have lots of statue of different type of Lords and also have the statue of bhrama. There is a good vibes in the atmosphere of temple . Nearest railway station is prayag ghat.
IT IS A HOLY TEMPLE OF SANKRACHARYA. THIS PLACE IS A PEAICE OF ARCHITECTURE
Very nice temple in Prayag.
Very good Temple everyone have to visit here.
Architecture was awesome!
It's a highly revolutionary place of prayagraj which creat a new source of energy in people's life
I found it in kumbh mela prayagraj ..great asharam for peace of mind
A highly spiritual place for feeling Devine vibrations ..everyone should visit once in life ...

Well maintained in all accepts to the deciples . Programs are going within in the time schedule with planned manner. 
Hospitality management is admirable.
Lineage from Yogoda Satsanga Society of India. Since I am a Kriyaban from YSS, I will recommend YSS only.

This place is nice but not that great as it is hipped.

Still they managed to have good Lassi with proper sweetness but it was to as thick as i thought it would be.

But there i had eat one of the different kind of sweet that is black carrot halawa first time in my life but it was same as red carrot halawa but made with black colored carrot.

Allahabad ki Shaan, RajaRam Lassi ki Dukan, since 100 years. Delicious Lassi is being served in Earthern pot (Kulhad) makes awesome taste with natural fragrance. Available even in winter season. Other milk products like Rabri, Paneer, Malai Puri is the best  in taste. - Talk of the Town.

Went to this place to try their lassi after knowing about it from YouTube and few websites... We travelled around 10km just to taste their lassi... It was not worth the hype... They are no more serving the lassi in Kulhad (earthen pot), it is served in cheap disposable plastic glasses... The lassi was already made... Didnt even felt like taking a pic...

Mouth watering lassi 
So much delicious and authentic taste
Sweet lassi made from fresh curd with a topping of Malai. Simply awesome.

Good place to hangout.they have decent coffee options. Good comfortable environment. Coffee quality can be improved. It's reputation doesn't match with its coffee quality.snacks served here are good.good location and well managed.the service here is good,staff's here are decent. parking is also available. Overall good place to chill
Good ambient. Nice seating arrangement. I always love a good CCD. This one is among the good ones. Food and drink as usual 😁 I mean just like CCD 🙂
Great place to relax and have coffee. Best thing is it is not in a congested area and you can park your car easily during the day.
Interior was quite good but coffee was average but if you want to sit in Open air you must carry mosquito coils because there are thousand mosquitos waiting for you.
One can spend good time. Either with some one or alone.
I’m always satisfied when I order from them!! And the delivery time is amazing!!!
Extra. Good. Pizza. And good deals. Too
Very good pizza and excellent customer service.

Traveling through Colorado we stayed at state park near by for 2 weeks. Had pizza from these guys 5 times and I have to admit they made great pizzas every single time. Pizza made to perfection. Best Domino's pizza I ever had. Give them a try you see what I mean
So good best pizza in the vally took kinda long but so worth it
Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki

Food is of very good quality. The 3 star review is for the attitude of people and the service provided.

"Whats special here" was our question, to which he says "Nothing". When we said we are coming from another part of the country and we need to try local cuisine. 

Either the waiter was in bad mood or thats how they behave. Took their sweet time to serve food. Sometimes, last arrived people received food before the ones who arrived earlier.

One of the best restaurant in town. Delicious and healthy food. Vast variety in menu. Best for South Indian food, sizzlers and continental. A complete family restaurant and a good place to hangout with friends. Love this place. Thumbs up.

Very nice food.....lovely place...Easy to locate with or without Google maps...lacks parking facility but otherwise it's best. Food is very yummy with the choice of normal and Jain meals, specially the mocktails they are just best. Responsible staff with good service....food served within the time they say..good sitting facilities.

Good option for dinning at Allahabad. Little bit costly according to quality. Larg group of 40-50 can be accommodated. North Indian and South Indian dishes are quite good. Quite pleasant and beautiful ambience... Very good service and very active staff... Overall had a very pleasant and praise worthy experience...👌👌👌

Sagar Ratna pure veg restaurant is a renowned restaurant in Allahabad which is very famous for its vegetarian dishes and Continental dishes..... I have tried some of the best dosas cutlets and their veg starters parking maybe an issue because they don't have their own personal parking space ..... the staffs are highly cooperative and you can even talk to chef in case you want to change the taste of your dishes.

..

Good place to hangout.they have decent coffee options. Good comfortable environment. Coffee quality can be improved. It's reputation doesn't match with its coffee quality.snacks served here are good.good location and well managed.the service here is good,staff's here are decent. parking is also available. Overall good place to chill
Good ambient. Nice seating arrangement. I always love a good CCD. This one is among the good ones. Food and drink as usual 😁 I mean just like CCD 🙂
Great place to relax and have coffee. Best thing is it is not in a congested area and you can park your car easily during the day.
Interior was quite good but coffee was average but if you want to sit in Open air you must carry mosquito coils because there are thousand mosquitos waiting for you.
One can spend good time. Either with some one or alone.

It's such a great place to spend your time with friends and family. The interior is awesome....with outdoor and indoor seating both .. the staff is great and courteous and the food is awesome. Loved my visit here .
Love the place... The ambiance and the food is amazing.... Must try it.... I'm looking forward to visit the place again.... Must give a try ... Everyone of you will love it ....

The place is really EDEN.
The place is really a serene. One could just connect.

But "EDEN" ALSO had the best FRUITS.
Need to work on the food part ,FOR REAL.

Their washing bowl is the biggest bowl i found comparing to the serving food bowl.

The serving quantity and food both need work.

The ambience is really great and the music really gets you going. But you don't go to a restaurant for sheer aesthetic purpose. The most fundamental aspect is the food. The restaurant lacks in menu especially when it comes to vegetarian food. Also, they do not have a good range of drinks and most of them lack in taste. There is nothing in their menu nor is there anything in the food they serve that can awaken your taste buds.

They serve the most exotic menu, order delicious food from a mammoth sized menu list.
Professional and polite staff and a great ambience is what you can expect.
The place has indoor and open air both kinds of seating.
Overall a 5star rating place undoubtedly.
P.S- must try lasagna and mushroom truffle soup.

The place is sweet and sober... Their food is super delicious.. totally loved it.. And it was perfectly plated.. Also the staff is very well behaved... Overall a perfect experience.. Definitely going on my frequent places list..

Very nice place to hangout with family and friends.Noticed this place while roaming around and looking for some decent place for lunch and I was not at all disappointed as I entered this restaurant. Ambience is amazing.Staff is also very good.The best part is that the restaurant has outdoor sitting as well and also very well managed. Now coming to the food,the menu offers you a lot of variety. Ordered both veg and non veg dishes and yes the food was really delicious. Last but not least price is really reasonable.Must try place while in Prayagraj.
Really nice ambience. Good service. Waitress was quick and had knowledge of the good food. Food is good. Quick service. A reasonable, pocket-friendly restaurant.

Good food. Combos are affordable.
 Location is friendly. Should visit after sunset to get a better view of the place.
One of the best place... One of the best thing is that it has both the cafe and restraunt.. loved the ambience and food.. price is budget friendly..
